title: No longer capable to view total hours.
body: On Websites Such as wol.gg or loltimeplayed.com we are only allowed to check our ranked hours or none at all and this message popped up. "Unfortunately, due to a change in the Riot API, This website is now offline. It is no longer possible to query the Riot database regarding a player's previously played games." It says this on www.loltimeplayed.com. I hope that this can be fixed some how because I like to view how many hours I have spent total on the game.

replies.body: We don't have any detail here, but as far as third party sites go we don't suggest relying on them. You could bring this up in the [API Community boards](https://discussion.developer.riotgames.com/index.html) to get eyes on the issue however.

I mean I believed that pre riot api changes wol.gg was very accurate. And I also have no source to rely on considering riot doesnt keep track of my hours and player support has no idea what even happened to the game based on my last ticket. But I will try.
